verses.verse: In the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> month, in the <S%H259>one<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H2292>Haggai,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H559><s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7597>Shealtiel,<s%> <S%H6346>governor<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3087>Josedech,<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> is <S%H7604>left<s%> among you <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> in her <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3519>glory?<s%> and <S%H4100>how<s%> do <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> it <S%H6258>now?<s%> is it <S%H3808>not<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> in comparison of <S%H3644>it<s%> as <S%H369>nothing?<s%>

Yet <S%H6258>now<s%> be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> O <S%H2216>Zerubbabel,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> O <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3087>Josedech,<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest;<s%> and be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> ye <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H6213>work:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H854>with<s%> you, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of hosts: <S%H6635><s%>

According <S%H853>to<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I <S%H3772>covenanted<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> you when ye came <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4480>Egypt,<s%> <S%H4714><s%> so my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H5975>remaineth<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you: <S%H3372>fear<s%> ye <S%H408>not.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> <S%H5750>Yet<s%> <S%H259>once,<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a little <S%H4592>while,<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H7493>shake<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and the <S%H2724>dry<s%> land;

And I will <S%H7493>shake<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and the <S%H2532>desire<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H935>come:<s%> and I will <S%H4390>fill<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H3519>glory,<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>
The <S%H3701>silver<s%> is mine, and the <S%H2091>gold<s%> is mine, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

The <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H314>latter<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> of the <S%H7223>former,<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts:<s%> and in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

In the <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> day of the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> month, in the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius,<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>by<s%> <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> <S%H7592>Ask<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> concerning the <S%H8451>law,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

If <S%H2005><s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in the <S%H3671>skirt<s%> of his <S%H899>garment,<s%> and with his <S%H3671>skirt<s%> do <S%H5060>touch<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> or <S%H5138>pottage,<s%> or <S%H3196>wine,<s%> or <S%H8081>oil,<s%> or <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3978>meat,<s%> shall it be <S%H6942>holy?<s%> And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>No.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H2292>Haggai,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> one that is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> by a dead <S%H5315>body<s%> <S%H5060>touch<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> of <S%H428>these,<s%> shall it be <S%H2930>unclean?<s%> And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> It shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H2292>Haggai,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3651>So<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H3651>so<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and <S%H3651>so<s%> is <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands;<s%> and that <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>you,<s%> <S%H7760>consider<s%> <S%H3824><s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H2962><s%> a <S%H68>stone<s%> was <S%H7760>laid<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> a <S%H68>stone<s%> in the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

Since those days <S%H4480>were,<s%> <S%H1961><s%> when one <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> a <S%H6194>heap<s%> of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> measures, there <S%H1961>were<s%> but <S%H6235>ten:<s%> when one <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the wine <S%H3342>vat<s%> for to draw <S%H2834>out<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> vessels out of the <S%H6333>press,<s%> there <S%H1961>were<s%> but <S%H6242>twenty.<s%>

I <S%H5221>smote<s%> you with <S%H7711>blasting<s%> and with <S%H3420>mildew<s%> and with <S%H1259>hail<s%> <S%H854>in<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>labors<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands;<s%> yet ye turned <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Consider <S%H7760><s%> <S%H3824><s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> from the <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H4480>day<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> month, even <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the foundation of the LORD's temple was <S%H3245>laid,<s%> <S%H1964><s%> <S%H3068><s%> <S%H7760>consider<s%> <S%H3824><s%> it.

Is the <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> in the <S%H4035>barn?<s%> yea, as <S%H5704>yet<s%> the <S%H1612>vine,<s%> and the fig <S%H8384>tree,<s%> and the <S%H7416>pomegranate,<s%> and the <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> brought <S%H5375>forth:<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> will I <S%H1288>bless<s%> you.

And <S%H8145>again<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> in the <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H559><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H2216>Zerubbabel,<s%> <S%H6346>governor<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H7493>shake<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H776>earth;<s%>

And I will <S%H2015>overthrow<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H4467>kingdoms,<s%> and I will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> the <S%H2392>strength<s%> of the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen;<s%> and I will <S%H2015>overthrow<s%> the <S%H4818>chariots,<s%> and those that <S%H7392>ride<s%> in them; and the <S%H5483>horses<s%> and their <S%H7392>riders<s%> shall come <S%H3381>down,<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of his <S%H251>brother.<s%>

In <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> will I <S%H3947>take<s%> thee, O <S%H2216>Zerubbabel,<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7597>Shealtiel,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and will <S%H7760>make<s%> thee as a <S%H2368>signet:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> thee, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>
